article_title: 3 Health Care M&A Deals and How Billionaire Investors are Playing Them
article_text:
Novice Trade: UnitedHealth

It makes sense to own some calls in this stock right now.

article_metadata.description: The health care industry is bursting with opportunity right now, perhaps especially on the M&A front. Billionaire investors aren't missing out.
